relnotes.name: Software Component Registry
relnotes.purpose: Provide APIs and data repository for software management on the device.

defect.title: Move SCR OOM tests to a new script
PREQ1269: SetServerHeapFail causing panic in SCRSERVER.EXE

relnotes.defect: Modified SCR interface to allow avoiding drive management when registering a file.

defect.title: SMPSAFE MMP file updates for SWI and USIF

relnotes.defect: updated MMP files for SWI and USIF components to declare them SMPSAFE

defect.title: Building ROMs results in a file not being found in siflauncherconfig.iby

relnotes.defect: As described in proposed solution in the defect - added EPOCROOT## to the path
Added a check when processing filters in SCR.
Added validation of input parameters in the SCR

defect.title: PREQ1269: Can set the component size negative

relnotes.defect: The API wasn't changed to Uint, as this would require the DB also to support unsigned values in the relevant column, and I couldn't see an option for doing it without disrupting the schema.

defect.title: PREQ1269: ALLOC Panic raised in scrserver.exe during uninstallation

relnotes.defect: In ref. installer, fixed the order of closing sub-sessions and sessions in the SCR

defect.title: scr.iby references missing files when building Techview

relnotes.defect: Refered to the generic data file's path; and cleanup the iby file.

defect.title: Incorrect date/time handling in the SCR

relnotes.defect: Fixed date/time handling in the SCR, so that CComponentEntry construction won't fail on the last month of the year or last day of the month.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Plugin management and highly desirable features (Phase 2)
deliverystep.preq: 1) Post-manufacture plugin management 2) Complex queries in the SCR 3) Additional smaller requirements and changes and 4) Improved security in the SCR

relnotes.defect: Added caching for the CComponentEntry object in the subsession. Improved the performance of RSisRegistryEntry::OpenL. Several other minor improvements.

defect.title: PREQ1269 - SCR database consumes much more disk space than SIS Registry

relnotes.defect: As N- series devices tend to have many in ROM components, most settings in the SCR DB were changed to favour ROM components as the default settings. Additionally, more settings were made optional for all components (index etc.)

defect.title: PREQ1269 - Processing of ROM stubs is very slow

relnotes.defect: Removing queries while adding files. Improving bitmask management for installed drives. Making more properties optional. Made default options to favour ROM components.
State variables were moved to the sub-session class instead of CRequestImpl class. This way the state is not shared across sub-sessions.

defect.title: PREQ1269: scrserver.exe::Main Panic KERN-EXEC 3 when listing with locale

relnotes.defect: Fixed a crash while matching downgraded locales for properties.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Security and Data Privacy: Universal Software Install Framework (Phase 1)
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.
